pr_title: Move to Android Junit Test Runner for Unit tests

timeline.message: removes the custom unit test runner

timeline.bodyText: Ohh Didn't realise you're adding tests for worker. Awesome!
timeline.author: ShivamPokhriyal
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
